Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Controller extends Object implements RequestListener
Controller class for the Model

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(List<Player> players, Model model, int numStudentToMove)
      Controller constructor. Initializes parameters, adds students to the clouds
      Parameters:
      players - Players to play this round
      model - Current model
      numStudentToMove - Number of students to move

  • Method Details

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(int playerId, int choice) throws CardException, NotPlayerTurnException, InvalidActionException
      Plays the chosen Assistant Card
      Parameters:
      playerId - Player that has played the Assistant Card
      choice - Assistant Card chosen
      Throws:
      CardException - if exception is thrown in PlanningPhase.playAssistantCard()
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      InvalidActionException - if the requested action is invalid
      See Also:
      • PlanningPhase

    • playCharacterCard

      public void playCharacterCard(int playerId, int choice) throws NotPlayerTurnException, NotEnoughCoinsException, CardException, InvalidActionException
      Play the chosen Character Card
      Parameters:
      playerId - Player ID that chooses the Character Card
      choice - chosen Character Card's ID
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      NotEnoughCoinsException - if the player doesn't have enough coins
      CardException - if an exception is Thrown in ActionPhase.playCharacterCard()
      InvalidActionException - if the requested action is invalid

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentToDiningRoom(int playerId, int choice) throws NotPlayerTurnException, InvalidActionException
      Moves the student to the player's Dining Room
      Parameters:
      playerId - player that requested the action
      choice - chosen pawn to move
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      InvalidActionException - if the requested action is invalid

    • moveStudentToIsland

      public void moveStudentToIsland(int playerId, int student, int island) throws NotPlayerTurnException, IslandException, InvalidActionException
      Moves the student to the chosen island
      Parameters:
      playerId - player that requested the action
      student - student to move
      island - destination to move the student to
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      IslandException - if the island chosen is invalid
      InvalidActionException - if requested action is invalid

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int playerId, int choice) throws NotPlayerTurnException, MotherNatureStepsException, InvalidActionException
      Moves MotherNature
      Parameters:
      playerId - player that requested the action
      choice - number of steps to move MotherNature
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      MotherNatureStepsException - invalid MotherNature steps requested
      InvalidActionException - if the requested action is invalid

    • takeStudentsFromCloud

      public void takeStudentsFromCloud(int playerId, int choice) throws NotPlayerTurnException, CloudException, InvalidActionException
      Take all the students from a cloud
      Parameters:
      playerId - player that requested the action
      choice - chosen cloud
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      CloudException - if invalid cloud chosen
      InvalidActionException - if the requested action is invalid

    • extraAction

      public void extraAction(int playerId, int... values) throws Exception
      Extra Action method helper, if the played character card contemplates an additional action
      Parameters:
      playerId - player that requested the action
      values - options varying based on the played card
      Throws:
      Exception - if any exception is thrown by the different called methods

    • endAction

      public void endAction(int playerId) throws NotPlayerTurnException, InvalidActionException
      Ends the playerId's Action
      Parameters:
      playerId - player whose action is ended
      Throws:
      NotPlayerTurnException - if it's not the playerId's turn
      InvalidActionException - if requested action is invalid

      Parameters:

      choice - choice of the wizard
      Throws:

    • onRequestEvent

      public void onRequestEvent(RequestEvent requestEvent) throws NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Given the requestedEvent, invoke the correct method
      Specified by:
      onRequestEvent in interface RequestListener
      Parameters:
      requestEvent - event requested.
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException - the requested method does not exist
      InvocationTargetException - wrapped exception thrown by an invoked method
      IllegalAccessException - if the method doesn't have the correct access authorization to the invoked class or field

      private void fireOptionEvent()
